explanation: [0-0] On the left side of the screen, a hand holds an open dark brown glass bottle with a yellow label, containing iodine. The background is a gray brick wall.

[0-2] A hand from the right side of the screen brings a cotton swab close to the bottle's opening, dipping it into the iodine. The hand removes the swab soaked with iodine, and a drop of iodine falls from the swab. The scene then shifts to a white shirt laid flat on a yellow table, with a red tag at the collar. Suddenly, a drop of brown liquid falls from above, landing on the collar of the white shirt.

The hand removes the swab soaked with iodine, and a drop of iodine falls from the swab. The scene then shifts to a white shirt laid flat on a yellow table, with a red tag at the collar. Suddenly, a drop of brown liquid falls from above, landing on the collar of the white shirt.

[2-4] A red X appears on the white shirt, and the scene shifts to a khaki-colored wooden table where a hand holds a white paper box with red and green stripes and Russian text, containing sodium thiosulfate.

[2-4] A red X appears on the white shirt, and the scene shifts to a khaki-colored wooden table where a hand holds a white paper box with red and green stripes and Russian text, containing sodium thiosulfate.

[4-7] The box is opened to reveal rows of ampoules filled with a clear liquid. A hand from the right side of the screen picks up one of the ampoules. The scene then shifts to focus on two hands holding the ampoule, with the left hand gripping the body and the right hand's thumb and index finger breaking off the top.

[7-10] The scene shifts again to show a hand holding the opened ampoule, pressing it against the iodine stain on the white shirt, allowing the clear liquid to drip onto the stain. As the hand repeatedly presses the ampoule on the shirt, the iodine stain gradually fades, leaving only a faint trace. A green check mark appears below the iodine stain.
